channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：美国呼吁以色列在加沙战争中立即停火的决议在联合国安理会遭到俄罗斯和中国的否决
item.description:
Breaking news: A US resolution calling for an immediate ceasefire in Israel’s war in Gaza was vetoed by Russia and China in the UN Security Council https://t.co/45rYfQsumx pic.twitter.com/1eU56JfKMz

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024

item.title: 乐高未能制造出无油砖块。下一步该怎么办？数百万人通过 @BrickLink 购买和出售乐高积木，这是一种积木市场。那么，关于 @Lego 的未来挑战，砖块的 eBay 能告诉我们什么呢？我和 @rmilneNordic 制作的 @FT 新电影：
item.description:
Lego failed to make oil-free bricks. So what's next? Millions of people buy & sell Lego through @BrickLink - a kind of marketplace for bricks. So what can the eBay of bricks tell us about @Lego's future challenges? New @FT Film by me & @rmilneNordic: https://t.co/TgO96Ds7ly pic.twitter.com/RKsn728mSt

— @tomhannen@mastodon.social (@tomhannen) March 21, 2024

item.title: 随着创纪录的大量资金涌入美国企业债券市场，投资者正急于在美联储预期的一系列降息措施之前锁定多年来最高的收益率。
item.description:
As record amounts of money flood into US corporate bond markets, investors are rushing to lock in the highest yields in years ahead of an anticipated series of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve. https://t.co/9tBgNPjRMa pic.twitter.com/vr7xtAtaeS

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024

item.title: 独家新闻：美国敦促乌克兰停止对俄罗斯能源基础设施的袭击，并警告乌克兰安全局和乌拉尔政府高级官员，无人机袭击有可能推高全球油价并引发报复。
item.description:
Scoop: The US has urged Ukraine to halt attacks on Russia’s energy infrastructure, warning senior SBU and GUR officials that drone strikes risk driving up global oil prices and provoking retaliation.
w/ @hallbenjamin @felschwartz @mylesmccormick_ https://t.co/DRussu4cAs via @FT

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 22, 2024

item.title: 随着要求以色列停止进攻的国际压力日益增大，美国将就一项联合国安理会决议进行表决，该决议呼吁立即在加沙停火六周，作为人质协议的一部分。
item.description:
The US will bring a UN security council resolution to a vote on calling for an immediate six-week ceasefire in Gaza as part of a hostage deal, as international pressure grows for Israel to rein in its offensive. https://t.co/45rYfQsumx pic.twitter.com/mP3DJ4rwB9

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在两天的大规模空袭之后，泽连斯基抨击乌克兰的西方伙伴未能提供军事援助。"俄罗斯的导弹没有延误，不像对我们国家的一揽子援助。沙赫特人没有优柔寡断，不像某些政客"。
item.description:
After 2 days of massive air strikes, Zelensky blasted Ukraine’s western partners over failure to provide military assistance. “There are no delays in Russian missiles, unlike aid packages to our state. Shaheds have no indecision, unlike some politicians.” https://t.co/pHbjYAoxcP

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 22, 2024

item.title: 安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）告诉《金融时报》，英国央行在未来的会议上 "有可能 "降息，因为有迹象表明，紧缩政策已经抑制了工资价格螺旋式上升的风险。
item.description:
'We have an increasingly positive story to tell.'

Andrew Bailey told the Financial Times that rate cuts were 'in play' at future meetings of the Bank of England amid signs that tighter policy had quelled the risk of a wage-price spiral. https://t.co/X3tECpcH4h pic.twitter.com/pwXEFNi1NW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024
